characters: Driver of a yellow car, driver of a white car, driver of a blue car
summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on a city road at night. The yellow car on the left side of the frame is moving ahead and gradually cutting into the lane of the self-driving vehicle. The white car on the right side is maintaining its position, while the blue car ahead is moving forward steadily.
actions: The self-driving vehicle is maintaining a consistent speed while observing the yellow car cutting into its lane from the left side. The vehicle is preparing to decelerate to avoid a potential collision.
key_objects: 1) Left side: A yellow car, approximately 2 meters away, cutting into the self-driving vehicles lane. 2) Right side: A white car, approximately 3 meters away, maintaining its position. 3) Front: A blue car, approximately 10 meters away, moving forward steadily.
